concept.title: Monitoring
concept.shortdesc: Use the following tips for help with monitoring the pipeline:

dlentry.dt: Why is snapshot not capturing any data?
dlentry.dd: When you request a snapshot, the tries to capture the next batch of data that moves through the pipeline. It skips any data that might be passing through the pipeline as you submit the request so it can capture a full batch of data.

But if data is slow to arrive at the origin, and the origin passes an empty batch (triggered by the batch wait time property), the captured batch might be empty. If this occurs, try capturing another snapshot.
